description:
Being a personal/administrative/executive Assistant is an important role that requires a special set of skills. Whether you are monitoring a boss's schedules, arranging a business travel, taking minutes in a board meeting, or preparing important files all should be done with a high degree of accuracy, transparency and confidentiality. Being trustful, reliable and discrete are some of the most important characteristics for an executive assistant.


Our Administrative Assistant Training course will show learners what it takes to be a very effective & efficient personal assistant. Students will learn how to effectively manage busy managers' schedules, organize meetings, and even how to be a smart gatekeeper. Being an personal/administrative/executive assistant takes a special skill set and this Udemy course will provide learners with the essential tools.

The course material will tackle some of the sub topics that are of common interest to administrative assistants such as: administrative assistant job description, administrative assistant duties, administrative assistant job, administrative assistant skills list, administrative assistant day, administrative assistant training & administrative assistant skills..etc

Learning Objectives:

  • Be flexible and adaptable to styles of senior management
  • Effective Communication skills (written, verbal, and nonverbal methods)
  • Improve time management, organizing and planning skills
  • Monitor meetings effectively
  • Learn how to be an effective gatekeeper
  • Be good at office technology & tools
  • Master note taking at management meetings
  • How to improve focus & concentration in meetings
  • Deal with technical subjects and jargon
